item.title: 21-04-2023 | BERT workshop with Enrique Manjavacas
item.description: On the 21th of April, Enrique Manjavacas, a postdoc research at Leiden University’s Centre for Linguistics will give a workshop on the BERT language model, and specifically the GysBERT and MacBERT models created with historical language data. Location: Digital Lab, P.J. Veth 1.07 Time: TBD
